pullRequest.title: [poloniex] Fixed Adapter due to changed return value from poloniex
pullRequest.bodyText:
The return value of reason seems to have changed to "airdrop_generic". These modifications should be able to handle old and current reason values.
The Adaptor also uses now the new FundingRecord.Type OTHER_INFLOW as adujstmends are no DEPOSITs

commit.message:
[poloniex] reason value seems to have changed to "airdrop_generic"

These modifications should be able to handle old and current reason values

nodes.bodyText: could we detect deposits instead of falling back on OTHER_INFLOW for anything other then an airdrop?
